sentences.en: Everglades mainly , situate in plain lake area on middle and downstream reaches in Changjiang River basin.
sentences.cn: 要全面规划, 统筹兼顾,做好中游平原湖区防汛抗旱、防涝排渍工作,保护湿地,防止土壤潜育化与沼泽化.

sentences.en: How do we situate Christianity in the context of modern physics and psychology?
sentences.cn: 我们如何将基督教置于现代物理学和心理学的背景中呢？

sentences.en: Situate the applicable arms knuckle sub - assembly so that the whole assembly appears as below.
sentences.cn: 位于适用的武器指 节子 装配,使整个大会出现如下.

sentences.en: Situate the seat stays so that they align into the marked positions.
sentences.cn: 位于座椅,使他们保持一致的显着位置将.

sentences.en: The company wants to situate its headquarters in Shanghai.
sentences.cn: 公司想把总部设在上海.

sentences.en: The company wants to situate its headquarters in the north.
sentences.cn: 公司想把总部设在北方.

sentences.en: The council are trying to decide where to situate the new hospital.
sentences.cn: 委员会正试图决定将新医院建在何处.

sentences.en: They are trying to decide where to situate the hospital.
sentences.cn: 他们正设法确定医院的修建地点.

sentences.en: We should situate a thinker and his thought in their proper place.
sentences.cn: 我们应当给一位思想家及其思想以合适的地位.

words.tran_cn: 使位于；使处于（situate的过去分词）

trans.tran_en: If you situate something such as an idea or fact in a particular context, you relate it to that context, especially in order to understand it better

trans.tran_cn: 使位于，使处于…地位（位置）
